abstract: A Manhattan fund-raiser for Representative Barney Frank was hosted and attended by Wall Street bankers. But, he insisted, "it's an LGBT fund-raiser."
snippet: A Manhattan fund-raiser for Representative Barney Frank was hosted and attended by Wall Street bankers. But, he insisted, "it's an LGBT fund-raiser."
lead_paragraph: It used to be controversial that Representative Barney Frank is gay. These days, he says, it is much harder for him to be associated with Wall Street.

headline.main: Barney Frank Raises Cash, From Gays and Wall St.
